name: Fruitworks - Trijam #181
description:
Made for Trijam #181

I didn't get to finish the game on time, however, you can still have some fun playing with this version until I make a complete one (If I do)

CONTROLS

  • Use the Mouse to drag the fruit bundles around
  • Use A to receive more fruit
  • Use D to change the current fruit request

HOW TO PLAY

Try to drag ONLY the correct fruit bundles onto the output belt (the one on the right), on top of the belt you'll see which fruit is currently being requested. Since the game is unfinished you're in control of the difficulty, however, one way of playing is to alternate pressing A and D (you can't press either two times in a row), while delivering the right bundles and organising the fridge... Or abuse the physics system and keep spawning fruit until your computer can't handle it anymore.

After a minute or so you'll realise that there is no difficulty curve or balance at all. So you could also just create as much chaos as possible and try to handle it afterwards without delivering the wrong fruit bundles :)

Hope you like it!
